technical_learnings: Local CI scripts using `uv run` ensure reproducible testing environments.
Bandit configuration is essential to filter out intentional subprocess usage in harness code.
Updating legacy linting issues (import sorting) is necessary when introducing stricter checks.
challenges_overcome: Missing dependencies for local CI script (solved by installing via uv/pip).
refactoring_candidates: Consolidate CI configuration into a single source of truth.
Automate pre-commit installation for new developers.
protocol_issues: Task tracking file (task.md) was missing initially.
process_improvements: Ensure `task.md` is always present or created at session start.
Promote use of local CI script in documentation.
